item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Oliver James
item.description: "why are trying so hard to fit in, when you're born to stand out" -- Oliver James

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Eddie Cantor
item.description: "Slow down and enjoy life. It's not only the scenery you miss by going too fast - you also miss the sense of where you are going and why." -- Eddie Cantor

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by richard brautigan
item.description: "all of us have a place in history. mine is clouds." -- richard brautigan

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by A.C. Grayling
item.description: "Middle age has been defined as what happens when a person's broad mind and narrow waist change places." -- A.C. Grayling

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage." -- Anais Nin

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "The secret of life is honesty and fair dealing. If you can fake that, you've got it made." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Live simply so others may simply live." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "That it will never come again is what makes life so sweet." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "When you consider things like the stars, our affairs don't seem to matter very much, do they?" -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "There are many things worth living for, a few things worth dying for, and nothing worth killing for." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I'm sorry for my inability to let unimportant things go, for my inability to hold on to the important things." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much" -- Helen Keller

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "You know how both life and porno movies end. The only difference is life starts with the orgasm." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "Life is half delicious yogurt, half crap, and your job is to keep the plastic spoon in the yogurt." -- Scott Adams

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Lin Yutang
item.description: "If you can spend a perfectly useless afternoon in a perfectly useless manner, you have learned how to live" -- Lin Yutang

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Patrick M. Lencioni
item.description: "If everything is important, then nothing is." -- Patrick M. Lencioni

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "Nothing of me is original. I am the combined effort of everyone I've ever known." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "This is your life and its ending one moment at a time." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "The only way to find true happiness is to risk being completely cut open." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Sean Mangan
item.description: "Life is too short when you think of the length of death" -- Sean Mangan

item.title: danny.ardianto add a quote by Charlie Schultz
item.description: "Sometimes I lie awake at night, and I ask, 'Where have I gone wrong'. Then a voice says to me, 'This is going to take more than one night." -- Charlie Schultz
